name: (In)sanity
description:
A twisting top down shooter, but the mechanics change every ten seconds

With your gun, shoot creatures that attack you and survive for as long as you can in three random maps. Every ten seconds, a random modifier is chosen (Inverted controls, slow bullets, low speed, exploding shots, etc.), giving the game challenge and getting out of control. Monsters too will get out of control if you don't kill them fast enough.

I am fourteen years old, and this is my first game jam! Hope you enjoy.

Music and SFX composed by my friend ThePatientHusky (Benjamin Wang) during the jam. Check out his works here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl3QNya9p-BJlk3zQO2mAyA

For some reason I couldn't export to WebGL, so it's currently Windows only.
